channel.title: Client problems dont know why though?
channel.description: ok well, first i had my server running with out clients and i decided to add a client, so i made client, it works for me, but when i send to a friend and he trys it says error connecting? and everything was working fine before till client came but it workd for me? wats wrong here?

item.title: Client problems dont know why though?
item.dc:creator: @itsfire2 itsfire2
item.description:
@itsfire2 wrote:

Because the hoster doesn’t have to enter an IP. If your hosting it, you will connect from the localhost.

Read full topic
item.source: Client problems dont know why though?

item.title: Client problems dont know why though?
item.dc:creator: @k0_gawd_k0 k0 gawd k0
item.description:
@k0_gawd_k0 wrote:

well then how come i can get on it? its just others cant

Read full topic
item.source: Client problems dont know why though?

item.title: Client problems dont know why though?
item.dc:creator: @itsfire2 itsfire2
item.description:
@itsfire2 wrote:

Maybe the client isn’t set to your servers IP, perhaps?

item.title: Client problems dont know why though?

item.description:

i have… people played my server without a client…

item.title: Client problems dont know why though?
item.dc:creator: @itsfire2 itsfire2
item.description:
@itsfire2 wrote:

You haven’t portforwarded correctly, no one will connect to your server but you.

Read full topic
